study_plan.title: Full Stack Developer Interview Study Plan

weeks.title: JavaScript & Frontend Mastery
weeks.goal: Solidify JavaScript fundamentals, master React/Next.js concepts, and be able to explain them confidently in interviews.

days.title: JavaScript Core Concepts

topics.name: Execution Context & Call Stack
topics.details: How JS engine executes code, GEC vs FEC

topics.name: Hoisting
topics.details: Variable (var, let, const) and function hoisting, Temporal Dead Zone

topics.name: Scope & Scope Chain
topics.details: Global, function, block scope; lexical scoping

topics.name: Closures
topics.details: Definition, practical uses (data privacy, currying, memoization)

topics.name: this keyword
topics.details: Rules (default, implicit, explicit, new binding), arrow functions

days.practice: Write 5 closure examples, explain output of tricky 'this' snippets

days.title: Async JavaScript & Event Loop

topics.name: Event Loop
topics.details: Call Stack, Web APIs, Callback Queue, Microtask Queue

topics.name: Promises
topics.details: States, chaining, Promise.all, Promise.race, Promise.allSettled

topics.name: Async/Await
topics.details: Error handling with try/catch, parallel execution patterns

topics.name: Callbacks vs Promises vs Async/Await
topics.details: Trade-offs, when to use each

topics.name: setTimeout/setInterval
topics.details: Debouncing, throttling implementations

days.practice: Implement Promise.all from scratch, debounce/throttle functions

days.title: Advanced JavaScript Patterns

topics.name: Prototypal Inheritance
topics.details: Prototype chain, Object.create, __proto__ vs prototype

topics.name: ES6+ Features
topics.details: Destructuring, spread/rest, Map/Set/WeakMap, generators, iterators

topics.name: Modules
topics.details: CommonJS vs ES Modules, import/export, dynamic imports

topics.name: Error Handling
topics.details: Custom errors, error boundaries, defensive programming

topics.name: Design Patterns
topics.details: Module, Singleton, Observer, Factory, Pub/Sub

days.practice: Implement Observer pattern, create a custom EventEmitter class

days.title: React.js Core Concepts

topics.name: Component Lifecycle
topics.details: Mounting, updating, unmounting; functional vs class

topics.name: Hooks Deep Dive
topics.details: useState, useEffect, useRef, useMemo, useCallback, useReducer

topics.name: State Management
topics.details: Lifting state, Context API, when to use Redux/Zustand

topics.name: Virtual DOM
topics.details: Reconciliation algorithm, diffing, keys and why they matter

topics.name: Custom Hooks
topics.details: Building reusable logic (useFetch, useLocalStorage, useDebounce)

days.practice: Build 3 custom hooks, explain re-render optimization strategies

days.title: Next.js & Advanced React

topics.name: Next.js Routing
topics.details: App Router vs Pages Router, dynamic routes, layouts, loading/error

topics.name: Rendering Strategies
topics.details: SSR, SSG, ISR, CSR — when to use each, trade-offs

topics.name: Data Fetching
topics.details: Server Components, use(), fetch caching, revalidation

topics.name: Performance
topics.details: Code splitting, lazy loading, Image/Font optimization, bundle analysis

topics.name: Middleware & API Routes
topics.details: Authentication, redirects, API handlers

days.practice: Explain BrokerStudio's architecture choices using Next.js concepts

days.title: CSS, Responsive Design & Frontend Testing

topics.name: CSS Deep Dive
topics.details: Flexbox, Grid, specificity rules, BEM methodology

topics.name: Responsive Design
topics.details: Mobile-first, media queries, container queries, fluid typography

topics.name: CSS-in-JS & Tailwind
topics.details: Styled-components, CSS modules, Tailwind utility patterns

topics.name: Testing
topics.details: Jest, React Testing Library, component tests, integration tests

topics.name: Accessibility
topics.details: ARIA roles, semantic HTML, keyboard navigation, screen readers

days.practice: Write tests for a React component, build a responsive layout from scratch

days.title: Week 1 Review (Sunday)

topics.name: Review
topics.details: Revisit weak areas, create JS cheat sheet, self-quiz on React hooks and Next.js rendering

days.practice: Self-assessment quiz on all Week 1 topics

weeks.title: Backend, Database & API Mastery
weeks.goal: Master backend frameworks, database design, and API architecture to confidently handle backend interview questions.

days.title: Node.js & Express.js Deep Dive

topics.name: Node.js Internals
topics.details: Event loop (libuv), single-threaded model, worker threads

topics.name: Express.js
topics.details: Middleware chain, routing, error handling middleware, request lifecycle

topics.name: Authentication
topics.details: JWT (access + refresh tokens), session-based, OAuth 2.0 flow

topics.name: Security
topics.details: Helmet, CORS, rate limiting, input validation, SQL/NoSQL injection prevention

topics.name: File Handling
topics.details: Multer, streams, buffer handling

days.practice: Build a secure REST API with JWT auth and rate limiting from scratch

days.title: Python & Django

topics.name: Django Architecture
topics.details: MVT pattern, ORM deep dive, QuerySets (lazy eval, Q objects)

topics.name: Django REST Framework
topics.details: Serializers, ViewSets, permissions, throttling, pagination

topics.name: Middleware
topics.details: Custom middleware, request/response processing order

topics.name: Django Admin
topics.details: Customization, ModelAdmin, custom actions

topics.name: Signals & Celery
topics.details: Async task processing, background jobs, scheduling

days.practice: Build a DRF API with custom permissions and pagination

days.title: SQL & Relational Databases

topics.name: SQL Fundamentals
topics.details: JOINs (INNER, LEFT, RIGHT, FULL, CROSS), subqueries, CTEs

topics.name: Indexing
topics.details: B-Tree, Hash, composite indexes, EXPLAIN ANALYZE, query optimization

topics.name: Database Design
topics.details: Normalization (1NF-3NF), denormalization trade-offs

topics.name: Transactions
topics.details: ACID properties, isolation levels, deadlocks, optimistic vs pessimistic locking

topics.name: Advanced SQL
topics.details: Window functions, stored procedures, triggers, views

days.practice: Solve 10 medium SQL problems on LeetCode/HackerRank

days.title: NoSQL & Database Comparison

topics.name: MongoDB
topics.details: Document model, aggregation pipeline, indexing, schema design patterns

topics.name: Redis
topics.details: Data structures, caching strategies (write-through, write-back, TTL), pub/sub

topics.name: SQL vs NoSQL
topics.details: When to use each, CAP theorem, eventual vs strong consistency

topics.name: Database Scaling
topics.details: Vertical vs horizontal, sharding, replication, read replicas

topics.name: ORMs
topics.details: Sequelize, Prisma, Django ORM — N+1 problem, eager vs lazy loading

days.practice: Design a database schema for a ticketing system

days.title: REST API Design & GraphQL

topics.name: REST Best Practices
topics.details: Resource naming, versioning, HATEOAS, pagination, filtering

topics.name: HTTP Deep Dive
topics.details: Status codes, methods (idempotency), headers, content negotiation

topics.name: API Security
topics.details: API keys, OAuth 2.0, rate limiting, CORS, input sanitization

topics.name: GraphQL Basics
topics.details: Queries, mutations, subscriptions, resolvers, schema design

topics.name: API Documentation
topics.details: Swagger/OpenAPI, Postman collections

days.practice: Design a RESTful API for a stock trading platform (like BrokerStudio)

days.title: Microservices, Message Queues & Integration Patterns

topics.name: Microservices
topics.details: Monolith vs microservices, service boundaries, API gateway

topics.name: Message Queues
topics.details: RabbitMQ, Kafka basics, event-driven architecture

topics.name: WebSockets
topics.details: Real-time communication, Socket.io, SSE (Server-Sent Events)

topics.name: Third-Party APIs
topics.details: Integration patterns, retry logic, circuit breaker pattern

topics.name: Webhooks
topics.details: Design, security (HMAC verification), idempotency

days.practice: Explain how you'd build real-time stock price updates (Alpha Vantage experience)

days.title: Week 2 Review (Sunday)

topics.name: Review
topics.details: Build a mini full-stack CRUD app (Node+React or Django+React) in 2 hours. Review SQL queries and API design patterns.

days.practice: Full-stack mini project + self-assessment

weeks.title: DSA, System Design & DevOps
weeks.goal: Build problem-solving skills for coding rounds, learn system design fundamentals, and strengthen DevOps knowledge.

days.title: Arrays, Strings & Hash Maps

topics.name: Patterns
topics.details: Two Pointers, Sliding Window, Prefix Sum, Frequency Counter

topics.name: Key Problems
topics.details: Two Sum, Valid Anagram, Longest Substring Without Repeating, Max Subarray

topics.name: String Manipulation
topics.details: Reverse, palindrome, pattern matching, string builder

topics.name: HashMap Techniques
topics.details: Counting, grouping, caching results

days.practice: Solve 8-10 LeetCode Easy/Medium (Arrays + Strings + HashMap)

days.title: Linked Lists, Stacks & Queues

topics.name: Linked Lists
topics.details: Reversal, cycle detection (Floyd's), merge two sorted, remove nth node

topics.name: Stacks
topics.details: Valid parentheses, min stack, evaluate expressions, monotonic stack

topics.name: Queues
topics.details: BFS implementation, circular queue, priority queue basics

topics.name: Implementation
topics.details: Build stack/queue from scratch in JavaScript

days.practice: Solve 6-8 LeetCode problems on these data structures

days.title: Trees & Graphs

topics.name: Binary Trees
topics.details: Traversals (in/pre/post/level order), height, diameter, LCA

topics.name: BST
topics.details: Search, insert, delete, validate BST, Kth smallest

topics.name: Graphs
topics.details: BFS, DFS, adjacency list/matrix, connected components, topological sort

topics.name: Common Patterns
topics.details: Tree recursion template, graph traversal template

days.practice: Solve 6-8 tree/graph problems on LeetCode

days.title: Sorting, Searching & Dynamic Programming Intro

topics.name: Sorting
topics.details: Merge sort, Quick sort, time/space complexity comparisons

topics.name: Binary Search
topics.details: Classic, rotated array, search in 2D matrix, bisect

topics.name: DP Fundamentals
topics.details: Memoization vs tabulation, identifying subproblems

topics.name: Classic DP
topics.details: Climbing stairs, coin change, longest common subsequence, 0/1 knapsack

days.practice: Solve 3 binary search + 4 DP problems on LeetCode

days.title: System Design Fundamentals

topics.name: Core Concepts
topics.details: Load balancing, caching (CDN, Redis), database sharding, replication

topics.name: Scalability
topics.details: Horizontal vs vertical, CAP theorem, consistent hashing

topics.name: Communication
topics.details: REST vs gRPC, sync vs async, message queues, event bus

topics.name: Design Template
topics.details: Requirements → Estimation → API → Data Model → High-Level → Deep Dive

topics.name: Practice Designs
topics.details: URL Shortener, Twitter Feed, Chat Application, Real-time Stock Dashboard

days.practice: Design a real-time stock dashboard (relate to BrokerStudio)

days.title: DevOps, Docker & CI/CD

topics.name: Docker
topics.details: Dockerfile, docker-compose, multi-stage builds, volumes, networking

topics.name: CI/CD
topics.details: GitHub Actions, pipelines, build → test → deploy workflow

topics.name: Cloud Services
topics.details: AWS (EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda), Azure/GCP equivalents

topics.name: DNS & Networking
topics.details: DNS resolution, SSL/TLS, Cloudflare, reverse proxy (Nginx)

topics.name: Monitoring
topics.details: Logging (ELK), monitoring (Prometheus/Grafana), error tracking (Sentry)

days.practice: Write a Dockerfile + docker-compose for a full-stack app, set up GitHub Actions

days.title: Week 3 Review (Sunday)

topics.name: Review
topics.details: Solve 5 random LeetCode mediums under time pressure. Practice explaining one system design problem out loud.

days.practice: Timed problem solving + verbal system design walkthrough

weeks.title: Mock Interviews & Final Polish
weeks.goal: Simulate real interviews, polish project stories, nail behavioral questions, and build confidence.

days.title: Project Deep Dives

topics.name: BrokerStudio / BrokerHub
topics.details: Architecture, tech choices, challenges, scale considerations

topics.name: Stock Comparison Widget
topics.details: API integration, rate limiting, caching strategy

topics.name: Ticketing System
topics.details: Data model, workflow design, real-time updates

topics.name: VitalHops
topics.details: DNS/SSL setup, Cloudflare integration, hosting decisions

topics.name: Storytelling Framework
topics.details: What → Why (tech choice) → Challenge → Solution → What I'd change

days.practice: Write a 2-minute pitch for each project, time yourself

days.title: Behavioral Interview Prep (STAR Method)

topics.name: Common Questions
topics.details: Tell me about yourself, Why this company, Greatest strength/weakness

topics.name: Technical Stories
topics.details: Hardest bug, architecture decision, performance optimization

topics.name: Collaboration
topics.details: Disagreement with team, mentoring, cross-functional work

topics.name: Growth
topics.details: How you stay updated, biggest learning, career goals

topics.name: STAR Format
topics.details: Situation → Task → Action → Result (with metrics if possible)

days.practice: Prepare 6-8 STAR stories covering different competencies

days.title: Full Mock Interview: Frontend Round

topics.name: JS Theory (15 min)
topics.details: Closures, event loop, promises

topics.name: Live Coding (20 min)
topics.details: Build a small React component with state management

topics.name: Architecture Discussion (10 min)
topics.details: React/Next.js architecture deep dive

days.practice: Use Pramp, Interviewing.io, or ask a friend to simulate

days.title: Full Mock Interview: Backend Round

topics.name: Backend Theory (15 min)
topics.details: Node.js/Django theory, REST API design

topics.name: Coding Challenge (20 min)
topics.details: SQL problem or API coding challenge

topics.name: DB Design Discussion (10 min)
topics.details: Database design and optimization discussion

days.practice: Practice writing SQL queries under time pressure

days.title: Full Mock Interview: System Design + DSA

topics.name: System Design (30 min)
topics.details: Design a real-time notification system or stock trading platform

topics.name: DSA Round (30 min)
topics.details: Solve 2 LeetCode mediums under time pressure

topics.name: Communication
topics.details: Practice thinking out loud and articulating your approach

days.practice: Articulation is as important as the solution itself

days.title: Final Review & Polish

topics.name: Review All Notes
topics.details: Revisit cheat sheets and notes from Weeks 1-3

topics.name: Re-solve Weak Areas
topics.details: Redo any problems you struggled with

topics.name: Elevator Pitch
topics.details: Finalize 'Tell me about yourself' (90 seconds)

topics.name: Interviewer Questions
topics.details: Prepare 5-7 thoughtful questions to ask interviewers

topics.name: Portfolio
topics.details: Organize portfolio (dynamicat.co) and GitHub repos

days.practice: Record yourself answering 3 behavioral questions, review for filler words

days.title: Week 4 Review — YOU'RE READY!

topics.name: Light Review
topics.details: Light review only. Rest well, eat well, sleep well. Confidence matters. You've put in the work!

days.practice: Relax, recharge, and trust the process
